name: HIVE12DT
title: HIV.E12.DT
description: Managing indeterminate test results: standard operating procedure

coding.display: Test infant using HIV testing algorithm, HIV.F8 Test infant/child for HIV using HIV testing algorithm

trigger.name: HIV.E12 Test infant using HIV testing algorithm, HIV.F8 Test infant/child for HIV using HIV testing algorithm

action.title: Report as HIV-negative. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-negative'.
action.description: Report as HIV-negative. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-negative'.

documentation.label: Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021); Fig. 2.8 Managing indeterminate test results: standard operating procedure.

expression.description:
(HIV.E12.DT.01)
  AND ("EID sample number"='EID sample 1')
  AND ("EID test number"='EID test number 1')
  AND ("EID test number 1 test result"='Negative')
  AND (-)
expression.expression: Should Report as HIV-negative. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set \"HIV test result\"='HIV-negative'.

action.title: Report as HIV-negative. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-negative'.

Report as HIV-negative. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Please refer to chapter 3 (Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021)) for further details on postnatal package of care.
Perform "EID test number"='EID test number 2' using EID sample no. 1
action.description: Perform "EID test number"='EID test number 2' using EID sample no. 1

documentation.label: Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021); Fig. 2.8 Managing indeterminate test results: standard operating procedure.

expression.description:
(HIV.E12.DT.02)
  AND ("EID sample number"='EID sample 1')
  AND ("EID test number"='EID test number 1')
  AND ("EID test number 1 test result"='Indeterminate')
  AND (-)
expression.expression: Should Perform \"EID test number\"='EID test number 2' using EID sample no. 1

action.title: Perform "EID test number"='EID test number 2' using EID sample no. 1

Perform test no. 2 using EID sample no. 1. All indeterminate tests should be repeat tested on the same specimen, if and when available. If the same specimen cannot be repeat tested, then a new specimen should be requested and tested as quickly as possible.
Report as HIV-positive. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-positive'.
action.description: Report as HIV-positive. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-positive'.

documentation.label: Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021); Fig. 2.8 Managing indeterminate test results: standard operating procedure.

expression.description:
(HIV.E12.DT.03)
  AND ("EID sample number"='EID sample 1')
  AND ("EID test number"='EID test number 1')
  AND ("EID test number 1 test result"='Positive')
  AND (-)
expression.expression: Should Report as HIV-positive. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set \"HIV test result\"='HIV-positive'.

action.title: Report as HIV-positive. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-positive'.

Report as HIV-positive. Manage in accordance with current guidance. Please refer to chapter 3 (Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021)) for further details on postnatal package of care.
Report as HIV-negative.  Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-negative'.
action.description: Report as HIV-negative.  Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-negative'.

documentation.label: Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021); Fig. 2.8 Managing indeterminate test results: standard operating procedure.

expression.description:
(HIV.E12.DT.04)
  AND ("EID sample number"='EID sample 1')
  AND ("EID test number"='EID test number 2')
  AND ("EID test number 1 test result"='Indeterminate')
  AND ("EID test number 2 test result"='Negative')
expression.expression: Should Report as HIV-negative.  Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set \"HIV test result\"='HIV-negative'.

action.title: Report as HIV-negative.  Manage in accordance with current guidance. Set "HIV test result"='HIV-negative'.

Report as HIV-negative. Manage in accordance with current guidance.  Please refer to chapter 3 (Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021)) for further details on postnatal package of care.

Report as HIV-inconclusive. Request a new sample within four weeks. Repeat samples should be given priority.  Do not report as positive or initiate ART but maintain prophylaxis in accordance with current guidance. Conduct further review by a clinical and laboratory team.Set "HIV test result"='HIV-inconclusive'
action.description: Report as HIV-inconclusive. Request a new sample within four weeks. Repeat samples should be given priority.  Do not report as positive or initiate ART but maintain prophylaxis in accordance with current guidance. Conduct further review by a clinical and laboratory team.Set "HIV test result"='HIV-inconclusive'

documentation.label: Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021); Fig. 2.8 Managing indeterminate test results: standard operating procedure.

expression.description:
(HIV.E12.DT.05)
  AND ("EID sample number"='EID sample 1')
  AND ("EID test number"='EID test number 2')
  AND ("EID test number 1 test result"='Indeterminate')
  AND ("EID test number 2 test result"='Indeterminate')
expression.expression: Should Report as HIV-inconclusive. Request a new sample within four weeks. Repeat samples should be given priority.  Do not report as positive or initiate ART but maintain prophylaxis in accordance with current guidance. Conduct further review by a clinical and laboratory team.Set \"HIV test result\"='HIV-inconclusive'

action.title: Report as HIV-inconclusive. Request a new sample within four weeks. Repeat samples should be given priority.  Do not report as positive or initiate ART but maintain prophylaxis in accordance with current guidance. Conduct further review by a clinical and laboratory team.Set "HIV test result"='HIV-inconclusive'

Report as HIV-inconclusive. For specimens with two indeterminate test results, a new sample should be requested. For infants repeatedly testing indeterminate, it is suggested that a team of experts review clinical and test information to determine the best follow-up care.Request a new sample within 4 weeks.  Do not report as positive or initiate ART but maintain prophylaxis in accordance with current guidance.Further review by a clinical and laboratory team.A team of laboratories, clinicians or paediatricians, complex case experts (if possible) and caregivers should review repeated indeterminate results in two separate samples together with clinical information. Infants should be actively tracked to ensure follow-up and retention.
Report as HIV-positive. Manage in according with current guidance.  Set "HIV test result"='HIV-positive'.
action.description: Report as HIV-positive. Manage in according with current guidance.  Set "HIV test result"='HIV-positive'.

documentation.label: Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021); Fig. 2.8 Managing indeterminate test results: standard operating procedure.

expression.description:
(HIV.E12.DT.06)
  AND ("EID sample number"='EID sample 1')
  AND ("EID test number"='EID test number 2')
  AND ("EID test number 1 test result"='Indeterminate')
  AND ("EID test number 2 test result"='Positive')
expression.expression: Should Report as HIV-positive. Manage in according with current guidance.  Set \"HIV test result\"='HIV-positive'.

action.title: Report as HIV-positive. Manage in according with current guidance.  Set "HIV test result"='HIV-positive'.

Report as HIV-positive.  Manage in accordance with current guidance. Please refer to chapter 3 (Consolidated guidelines on HIV prevention, testing, treatment, service delivery and monitoring: recommendations for a public health approach (2021)) for further details on postnatal package of care.
